en-US.name: All Access
en-US.summary: All Access is a great addition because you will hear places about food, drink and nightlife, plus any future categories added.
en-US.description: All Access expands the set of places shared with you to include places about food, drink and nightlife.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The All Access pass adds over 30 food, drink and nightlife places into the set of places randomly chosen to be shared with you.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing the All Access pass!  You now have access to food, drink and nightlife places!

testingInstructions: Built Using Sample Fact In Skill Purchases
